documentation.text:
Mints reward tokens from supported Curve clone contracts.
 @return Whether reward tokens were claimed by XStable contract

Mints from all curve pools with a positive balance in the contract
 @return Whether mint was successful

Mints from swerve pool if it has a positive claimable token balance
 @return Whether mint was successful

Swaps reward tokens to USDC via Uniswap
 @return _usdcAmount Amount of USDC collected from sales

Swaps a token to USDC via uniswap v2 router
 @return Whether token was swapped to USDC

Claim USDC for user based on time weight % of supply held by user
 @return rewardAmount Amount of USDC reward allocated to user

Calculates virtual price based on total deposits across all liquidity gauges
 @return virtualPrice Current virtual price for 1 XSUSD

documentation.text:
Mints reward tokens from supported Curve clone contracts.
 @return Whether reward tokens were claimed by XStable contract

Mints from all curve pools with a positive balance in the contract
 @return Whether mint was successful

Mints from swerve pool if it has a positive claimable token balance
 @return Whether mint was successful

Swaps reward tokens to USDC via Uniswap
 @return _usdcAmount Amount of USDC collected from sales

Swaps a token to USDC via uniswap v2 router
 @return Whether token was swapped to USDC

Claim USDC for user based on time weight % of supply held by user
 @return rewardAmount Amount of USDC reward allocated to user

Calculates virtual price based on total deposits across all liquidity gauges
 @return virtualPrice Current virtual price for 1 XSUSD

returns.rewardAmount: Amount of USDC reward allocated to user

params._amount: Amount of LP tokens to deposit

returns._0: Whether reward tokens were claimed by XStable contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._amount: Amount of LP tokens to withdraw

claimRewards().notice: Claim USDC for user based on time weight % of supply held by user

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Deposit LP tokens and receive XSUsd based on current virtual price of LP token

getVirtualPrice().notice: Calculates virtual price based on total deposits across all liquidity gauges

mintPoolRewards().notice: Mints reward tokens from supported Curve clone contracts.

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Withdraw XSUsd in LP tokens based on current virtual price of LP token and reserves available in XStable
